title: SEO Content Strategist
job_overview:
This is a part-time remote role wokring directly with our U.S. and Philippine-based marketing team to build, manage, and refine SEO strategy. We are hiring a skilled SEO expert who knows how to rank, write, and convert.

We need someone who can own the SEO strategy, create optimized content, and drive qualified organic traffic across our two WordPress-based sites. Youâ€™ll be expected to take initiative: run technical audits, develop keyword strategies, write your own optimized landing pages and blog content, and collaborate with our team to move the needle.

This role will begin with a heavier workload to clean up and optimize both sites, then shift into ongoing monthly work focused on performance growth.

Responsibilities
Audit both websites for technical SEO issues and prioritize fixes
Create full-funnel keyword strategies targeting B2B and B2C buyers
Write and submit optimized landing pages, blog content, and product copy for approval
Set up and refine on-page SEO (headings, internal links, metadata, etc.)
Optimize and structure content for semantic relevance and featured snippets
Analyze competitor content and backlink strategies
Collaborate with our in-house marketing team
Track SEO KPIs in SEMrush, Search Console, and GA4
Monitor and manage indexing, site health, site speed, and mobile optimization
Help maintain and improve local SEO and Google Business profiles

Required Skills & Tools
5+ years of hands-on SEO experience with measurable results
Strong writing skills: clear, concise, and optimized for search intent
Expert-level experience with SEMrush, Ahrefs, GA4, Search Console
Fluent in WordPress SEO (including plugins like RankMath or Yoast)
Ability to prioritize and write content across both short- and long-tail queries
Experience implementing schema markup and structured data
Understanding of internal linking, content silos, and topical authority
Basic understanding of HTML/CSS and technical SEO elements
Excellent communication and responsiveness

Nice to Have
Familiarity with the apparel, print, or promo products industry
Experience with Printavo, Inksoft, or Chipply
CRO knowledge (CTAs, layout, messaging hierarchy)
Some experience with backlink building 
Comfort editing or briefing designers for SEO-friendly layouts

Why This Role?
100% Remote
Flexible hours with clear deliverables
Long-term potential with room to grow 

How to Apply:
Send your resume and your LinkedIn profile URL.
